marklogic.body:
Pamela
"Recent news stories about our president apologizing over and over to Afghan President Hamid Karzai over the Burning of Qur’ans leaves out important facts"
How about asking the question what were we doing there in the first place. Invading other countries illegally, and no business there in the first place. Then we have to face the consequences! Don´t we. Stop Acting as the world police putting our nose in other peoples businesses where we do not belong and we don't have to worry about anything. Simple.
